package.name: @choice-ui/table
package.description: Table component for Choiceform Design System

props.description:
Table component with compound components pattern.

Supports:
- Row selection (single/multiple)
- Consecutive selection rounded corners
- Virtualization for large datasets
- Two scroll modes: "container" (internal ScrollArea) or "window" (window scroll)

props.name: getRowKey
props.description: Function to get unique key for each row

props.name: overscan
props.description: Number of rows to render outside viewport

props.name: scrollRef
props.description: Custom scroll element ref (for custom container scroll)

props.name: containerRef
props.description: Custom container ref (for custom container scroll)

props.name: onRowClick
props.type: ((row: T, event: MouseEvent<Element, MouseEvent>) => void) | undefined

props.description: Props for the Table root component

stories.name: Basic
stories.description:
Basic table with selection support.

Features:
- Multi-row selection with checkboxes
- Consecutive selection rounded corners
- Fixed height container scroll
stories.source:
import { Table } from "@choice-ui/table" import { useState, useMemo } from "react" export default function App() { const users = useMemo(() => generateUsers(20), []) const [selectedKeys, setSelectedKeys] = useState<(string | number)[]>([]) return (
Selected: {selectedKeys.length} rows
user.id} selectable selectionMode="multiple" selectedKeys={selectedKeys} onSelectionChange={setSelectedKeys} height={400} className="w-full rounded-lg border" > Name Email Role Status No users found}> {(user, index) => ( {user.name} {user.email} {user.role} )}
) }

stories.name: Single Selection
stories.description:
Single selection mode.

Features:
- Only one row can be selected at a time
- Clicking a new row deselects the previous one

stories.name: No Selection
stories.description:
Table without selection.

Features:
- No checkbox column
- Read-only display mode
- Row click handler for navigation or details

stories.name: Sortable
stories.description:
Sortable columns.

Features:
- Click column headers to sort
- Toggle between ascending, descending, and unsorted
- Sort indicator icons
stories.source:

) }

stories.name: Virtualized
stories.description:
Large dataset with virtualization.

Features:
- Renders 10,000 rows efficiently
- Virtual scrolling for performance
- Smooth scrolling experience

stories.name: Window Scroll
stories.description:
Window scroll mode - uses browser window for scrolling.

Features:
- No internal scroll container
- Integrates with page scroll
- Useful for full-page table layouts

stories.name: Custom Scroll Container
stories.description:
Custom scroll container - uses external ScrollArea.

Features:
- Provides scrollRef and containerRef for custom integration
- Full control over scroll behavior
- Useful for complex layouts

- Avatar integration
- Multiple badges per row

stories.name: Loading

Loading state.

stories.name: Range Selection
stories.description:
Shift+Click range selection.

- Works with multi-selection mode
